text: Edvaldo Esmael Ferreira (born 28 May 1990) is an Angolan handball player for Smouha Club Alexandria and the Angolan national team.2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Angolan male handball players Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Angolan expatriate sportspeople in Egypt Category:Angolan expatriate sportspeople in Tunisia Category:African Games silver medalists for Angola Category:African Games medalists in handball Category:Competitors at the 2011 All-Africa Games Category:Competitors at the 2015 African Games
title: Edvaldo Ferreira
